item.description:
OK, all you ghouls, goblins and witches...so you couldn't make the hayride. Well, it's not a total loss, because the hayride is just the beginning. I am posting the bonfire and Halloween party as a separate event. So, please join us for a frightful night of merriment around the fire!

Those going on the hayride will be backaround 10pm. However, you are welcome to start the fun at 9pm. Come for s'mores or the witches brew...but make sure YOU COME! We will have some fun games...I'll bet you haven't played beer pong in years...lol. Singing around the fire...scary stories...special pickies (finger foods). Alot of laughs and good folks just enjoying each others company! You can come in costume, if you like...or not. It's up to you!

All are welcome! Just bring a chair, maybe a snack or finger food and whatever you like to drink.Oh, yeah, bring a smile and prepare to have a SCREAMING good time....BOO!!!!!!!

My son and some folks will be there to welcome you at 9pm. The hayriders will be there at 10pm. I am sure you will have that fire all set up for us by 10...lol!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: White House with Red Brick Front...it is numbered on the mailbox!..look for the orange balloons!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Bonfire and Halloween Party!!!
